price: ಫರೋಹ ಹೇಳಿದನು: “ಹೌದು! ನೀವು ಖಂಡಿತ ನನ್ನ ಆಪ್ತರಾಗಿ ಬಿಡುವಿರಿ.”
arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ

version.title: Kannada translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kannada language, translated by Muhammad Hamza Battur.

meta.transliteration: qāla naʿam wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabīna
translations: the ones who are brought near
